DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate pharmacokinetic property icariin , active ingredient over-the-counter supplement , Horny Goat Weed .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study investigate pharmacokinetic property icariin , active ingredient over-the-counter supplement , Horny Goat Weed . Healthy volunteer randomly assign 5 day course icariin 100 mg/day , 200 mg/day , 400 mg/day , 800 mg/day , match placebo . 24 hour blood sample draw pharmacokinetic analysis . Side effect assess full 5 day .
DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman Ages 18 50 year BMI 18.5 30 Ability read speak English Education 12 year equivalent ( least GED receive ) Medication change past 30 day History psychotropic medication therapy past 30 day Current past 30 day opioid therapy Current past 30 day erectile dysfunction therapy Significant medical condition Hypertensive blood pressure , define either systolic pressure > 140 diastolic pressure > 90 Baseline heart rate > 100 bpm < 50 bpm History major psychiatric illness History drug/alcohol abuse current tobacco use Vulnerable population include pregnant nursing woman , incarcerate , individual severe cognitive disorder History allergic reaction contraindication icariin Baseline QIDS score > 7 , current suicidal ideation , history suicide attempt Education history include Special Education history mental disability Clinically significant abnormality baseline labs ECG result Current participation pharmacotherapy study
